examples: He breathed deeply before speaking again.
Respiró profundamente antes de volver a hablar.
The air was so cold we could hardly breathe.
El aire estaba tan frío que apenas podíamos respirar.
She was beginning to breathe more easily.
Empezaba a respirar con más facilidad.
He was breathing heavily after his exertions.
Respiraba con dificultad después de sus esfuerzos.
